item.description: Stocks continued to tumble in the U.S. Friday as financial markets suffered their biggest two-day drop since 2020.

item.title: WATCH: Bald eagle stares down dog as owners watch: 'Could she carry our dog away?'
item.description: A Washington family and their dog Gnocchi were transfixed when they spotted a bald eagle peering in the glass door of their lakeside home.

item.title: Strong 6.9 magnitude earthquake reported near Papua New Guinea
item.description: A strong 6.9 magnitude earthquake struck near Papua New Guinea on Saturday morning local time, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.

item.title: 3 family members hit, killed by Amtrak train near Philadelphia
item.description: Amtrak service between Philadelphia and New York was halted for hours after three family members were struck and killed by a train in Bucks County.

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: 'Only the weak will fail,' Trump says as markets fall
item.description: Trump said, "Only the weak will fail," as the markets saw major losses on Friday.

item.title: Midwest, South hit with rain and flooding amid tornado recovery
item.description: Parts of the Midwest and South were hit with rain and flooding even as many communities were still reeling from tornadoes that killed several people.
